Posted By: Renanvsr (2/1/2010 4:58:14 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Unfortunately replaced by [Armored Ascension](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Armored Ascension) and [Oakenform](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oakenform) in M10. This card is a staple in mono-green decks and powerful enough to make the aura drawback seem worthwhile. Try enchanting a [Silhana Ledgewalker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silhana Ledgewalker) with this and you will have a very difficilt creature to deal with. If they do bring it back, considering the plains version has flying, I don't think adding trample would be too big of an ask.
posts.html:

If they do bring it back, considering the plains version has flying, I don't think adding trample would be too big of an ask.
